channel.title: Untradeables - PI
channel.description: Well I'm tired of my players losing thier fire capes and bitching to me when they get farcasted in wilderness for 2-3 mins so they cant grab it, I want thier untradeables to stay in thier inventory or at that wielded, help.

item.title: Untradeables - PI
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

Um try this? player assistant.java you might wanna change the inpits fightcaves and infunpk method to yours.

public void giveLife() { c.isDead = false; c.faceUpdate(-1); c.freezeTimer = 0; c.lastsummon = -1; if (c.duelStatus <= 4 && !c.getPA().inPitsWait()) { // if we are not ina duel we must be in wildy so remove items if (!c.inPits && !c.inFightCaves() && !c.inFunPk()) { c.getItems().resetKeepItems(); if ((c.playerRights == 2 && Config.ADMIN_DROP_ITEMS) || c.playerRights != 2) { if (!c.isSkulled && !c.isInFala() && !c.isInArd()) { // what items to keep c.getItems().keepItem(0, true); c.getItems().keepItem(1, true); c.getItems().keepItem(2, true); c.getItems().keepItem(6570, true); // this keeps firecape }

Read full topic
